ygData.messageBody:
damn i wanna go to mith mar hehe. On the bright side i decided to say bye
bye to ac this weekend and go for more looks. Traded away my tree weave for
a rygorr bp. So i've got rygorr legs/bp/arms/helm/gloves and the rest of my
armor is ss boots/helm/arms/gloves and hero bracer/kylong. So im all green
and chain *cheer*

Now if i can only get soemone to drag my butt to PoG or PoH

From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
